author: stevel
msg: lower success message to verbose output on schema validation. Could do the same for XmlValidate, and indeed, am sorely tempted to. Also added some javadocs.

author: stevel
msg: Worked out how to validate XSD files themselves. Changes to task made, and the examples of the task now show how to do this.

author: mbenson
msg: Pathconvert no longer requires that one of (targetos|pathsep|dirsep)
be set; platform defaults are used when this is the case.
